description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Cauliflower With Tahini Yoghurt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Ham,High fibre,High protein,Roast,Seafood free,Low sugar,Cauliflower
name: Roasted Cauliflower With Tahini Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 slice wholemeal soft sandwich bread (for snack)
50g champagne thinly sliced leg ham (for snack)

recipeInstructions.text: Lunch: Preheat oven to 200oC (180oC fan-forced). Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place cauliflower on prepared tray and spray lightly with oil. Roast for 20-25 minutes or until golden and tender. Set aside to cool completely.
Meanwhile, combine yoghurt, tahini and lemon juice until smooth. Cover and refrigerate yoghurt until needed. Serve cauliflower with yoghurt.
Snack 1: Remove crusts from bread. Spread bread with tzatziki. Top with ham and carrot. Roll tightly, then cut into pinwheels.
